metadata.title: USN-4495-1 -- Apache Log4j vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Apache Log4j does not properly deserialize  untrusted data. An attacker could possibly use this issue to remotely execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2019-17571)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4495-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liblog4j1.2-java-doc - 1.2.17-8+deb10u1build0.18.04.1 liblog4j1.2-java - 1.2.17-8+deb10u1build0.18.04.1 No subscription required
